Reviews.Title: “Worst I've Experienced”
Reviews.Author: Tina H
Reviews.Content: lobby nice 115 smelled terrible bed dirty bedspread pillow towels hangers phone floor disgusting brought receptionist apologized profusely moved 328 didnt smell bad towels awful floor rug horrible kept shoes walk wind whistled eerily door night couldnt bring shower ive stayed suburban extended stay hotels cheap clean repair hotel condemned based reviews sounds ok recommend hotel based experience

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for the Price”
Reviews.Author: plano81
Reviews.Content: stayed week weekly rate kitchen fridge microwave stove free wireless bed comfy dont understand people youre paying 30 dollars night hilton marriott type pay 200 dollars night paid 200 week anyway super affordable safe clean etcthis choice pay 1200 week someplace else hope helps
